Tip: For small spaces you can use scented sticks or a scented candle to create a pleasant atmosphere. Also consider a room spray for direct air freshening.
Tip: For medium-sized rooms we recommend using one or more scented sticks or candles, but a room spray and incense also work well in a larger space.

Question: Tip: Scented candles are ideal for creating an atmosphere and spreading a beautiful scent at the same time.
Tip: Fragrance sticks or sachets are perfect for constantly scenting a room in a subtle way. Easy and evenly distributed without having to worry about anything.

Tip: Room sprays and incense are a practical and effective way to instantly refresh a room. You can also use a room spray on color-true fabrics such as a curtain rug and even the car mat to make a fragrance linger longer. Always test this first on a piece of fabric out of sight.
